positive_examples: This is an example of medical robot.
The medical robot demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed medical robot in this context.
A typical case of medical robot would involve these features.
The concept of medical robot applies here.
A robot designed for healthcare applications such as surgical assistance, patient care, or medical diagnostics.
negative_examples: This is an example of autonomous mobile robot, not medical robot.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AutonomousMobileRobot, or other types of Robot

definition: A robot designed for healthcare applications including surgery and patient care.
